[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of -412,212,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 51,143,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300071188HIDJEB11/2021-12-31/ESEF/SE/0/africaoilcorp-2021-12-31-en.zip/africaoilcorp-2021-12-31-en/reports/africaoilcorp-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 8026
